item.description:
Come on down to the beautiful Dedham Country and Polo Club for the Sitzundjibers Spring Fling Dance!! Don't miss this opportunity for dancing and romancing to the sounds of Tim McHale and the Knuckleheads rock and roll band.

Dance the night away while refreshing yourself with hot appetizers, a cheese plate and cold drinks at the cash bar; followed by deserts and coffee all in the grand ballroom of the Dedham Country and Polo Club.

There is plenty of free parking and the club is centrally located, less than a mile and a half from route 128 in Dedham near the border of Westwood, Dover, and Needham. Bring your friends!

Dress: Jackets and ties for gentlemen; cocktail dress for the ladies.

Cost: $25 at the door.

For more information see the Sitzundjibers website. Sitzundjibers Calendar
item.how_to_find_us: Please RSVP so I'll be on the lookout for you.
item.why: We're trying out some dances arranged by other organizations that are open to the public. This one looks excellent!
item.name: Spring Fling Dance with the Sitzundjibers
